full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI RTZA RGYUD KYI GZHUNG LAS LEN PA DE NI SHIN TU BSDUS PA'I PHYIR, DE LAS CHUNG RGYAS NAS BGYI BA ZHES, AER TE NI TZAS SANG BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS ZHES BYAS PA 'DI LTA BU DGOS ZHES NAN TAN GYIS YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I DO MCHOG PAR, SKYABS GNAS DAM PA DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA BYUNG RGYAL DU SONG BA'I BLO BZANG DGON MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA LA LHA GCIG CHAD LA SOGS PA'I NYES SKYON THAMS CAD BLA MA LHA DANG CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS KYIS THUGS BRTZE BA'I GZOD PAR MDZAD DU GSO, ,GAL TE LEGS CHA @009B CUNG ZAD YOD NA NGES BDAG SOGS 'GRO KUN 'DI NAS BYANG CHUB MA TOB KYI BAR DU LAM BZANG GI SKYEN NGAN PAR CHOD KUN BZLOG PA'I GROGS MDZAD PAR GYUR CIG ,'GRO BA THAMS CAD LA DGE BAR GYUR CIG ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
